attributes.action: Existing skilled workers must be remained on 5 years route to gain ILR status.
attributes.background: Government should consider the existing hard skilled workers to be remained on 5 years rule. They contribute so much to society since  Feb 2022.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
